# f5distributedcloud_waf (Resource)

Manages an F5 Distributed Cloud WAF. WAF provides web application firewall protection.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the WAF.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the WAF is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the WAF.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the WAF.
